result.title: Codeforces Round #288 (Div. 2)
result.content:
GL&HF

UPD:

I did virtual participate.

A: Implementation

B: If you work out a few examples, it shouldn't be too difficult to figure out solution. Just a few corner cases.

C: If you noticed that greedy approach works, it shouldn't be too difficult. The implementation is kind of tricky in my opinion, but the size of each input is really small (<=300).

So if you implement it correctly, there is almost no way to get TLE.

D: didn't read

E: couldn't solve.
